reviewDescription: Nice product.  But the mounting disk that comes with it. The double sided tape is not worth trying to stick. It unsticks within an hour after installation. Now the mounting disk works great.

i live in hemet ca.... HOT... in summer... can be 110...this just slides off the window... i even have a plastic disk on my dast.... in the heat... it falls off...and leaves a sticky mess.but i use the vent clip and it is ok... it works

This isn't too bad. I use the grip that goes on your vents, and it holds the way it's supposed to. It's a little loose but works the way it should.

I tried both thr 3M pad and main sticky end for thr dashboard mount and neither stuck. So now I am using thr vent mount.  It works ok, but if you have a heavy phone case it will make thr mount tilt down so I'm constantly lifting my phone up.

reviewTitle: "I Got The Batch With  A Product That Got Away From Quality/ COSTUMER SERVICE RATING"
reviewDescription: As my product review with the first order, company did reply back to make things right which I really appreciate. They sent me a free disk phone holder to try and I am very thankful for all effort and great costumer care they showed me. They do really care about the impact of their products to valued costumers.I apologize for the long rating, the 2nd one provided to me worked for awhile... couldn't really figure out why it falls after being put in the disk slot for at least few days... I enjoyed the moments I've used it, it is very cool. Again very sorry for any inconvenient I have cost as a costumer but I will be only rating costumer care service, effort of the company, great communication/ response....Didn't do what the advertising claimed.... Suction is badly poor👎🏽👎🏽 Waste of my money 💰 💰 "1 STAR FROM ME!!!!" I ordered new Suction to replace the bad batch i got!!! Yeah! Yeah! Yeah! I learned alot from working in plastic manufacturing on how business works for 8 years from being a temp employee to becoming the 3rd shift Quality Lead. I bought this around the beginning of this year⏳. I belive🤔. Instead of returning it, I just went ahead and kept it and try to fix it ourselves🤳🏽🧲 Then we forgot all about it for quite awhile⏱ I was just going through my history then I saw this🤔 I'm  only sharing my experienced with this product📦

I bought this to install it on the dash of my 2024 Honda Accord. The dash doesn't have a lot of flat real estate to work with and it's not a smooth surface. The instructions call for waiting 24 hours before using the phone holder after attaching the holder to the base. I waited longer and could tell it wasn't going to work. The base never stuck good to the dash surface.The remaining options are using the suction cup to attach it to the windshield (don't want to do that) or use the included clip to attach it to the A/C vent.  The problem is that that's not on Hondas. So, I ended up using it on the cup holder which is not desirable, but the only viable option I have other than buying another holder and trashing this one.

I had the older version of this mount. So when I needed a new one, of course I went back to this mount because me, my husband, and my son all have it and love it. But this one DOES NOT STICK to the dashboard of my Mazda. Even the 3M disk mount attachment doesn't stick. It's very disappointing. I had high hopes and this just isn't it.

reviewTitle: Does not stick very well and suction is poor also
reviewDescription: I only gave this 2 stars because Does not stick. Suction not great either. Pretty color, matches pic. Hold phone tight. Easy release.

reviewTitle: I wanted to loved it, but
reviewDescription: This is a very well made product and I really wanted to love it, but it was a miserable failure. After applying the device to the suction cup plate, I waited another hour before trying to place my phone into the holderImmediately my phone and the device crashed to the floor of my vehicle. Mounting the phone gives us hands free media and is visible to see. Does not stay adhered to dash.
Dash mount

I had bought it 2 years back and i was thinking such products should be fine for few years. But unfortunately  its not holding on to the dashboard any more and comes off easily ... may be the sticky suction part has gone off.

reviewTitle: Hard to find space for it in small car fo it to stick
reviewDescription: Difficult to finger a space for it in my small car .  When I did attach it, it did not stay attached.

*Update* it says my phone is compatible (iPhone 12) but seems too heavy for the hardware. The round plastic knob broke and my phone is always tilted down. Didn’t want to have to purchase an entire new mount so I messaged the seller about purchasing a replacement part and have not heard back. Changed my rating because of this! I’ll be looking into another more durable mount.So after following instructions: cleaning dash with alcohol, letting it dry, sticking dash pad & leaving it for 72hrs … the phone and mount came falling down. The dash pad did not stick! However I have it suctioned to my windshield and the suction is good so far, it’s been about a month. I bought this with the intention of using it on the dash so there’s some disappointment there, other than that I like the way my phone is secure in the mount and I have the option to use the vent clip if needed. That deserves 4/5 stars alone, however the seller should consider giving more than one dash pad cause once it falls off it cannot be reused only purchased and that feels a little unfair.

I have a 2017 Hyundai Santa Fe Sport.  Tried to use the dashboard mount.  Cleaned the dashboard, applied the adhesive part more than 24 hours in advance.  Attached the suction part and it fell off.  Adhesive was completely useless.  Dashboard isn't completely smooth but it's probably pretty common.  As soon as the part that is supposed to adhesive to the dashboard came off, I touched it, wasn't adhesive at all.The good part is they include a piece that will connect to your vents.  That piece works great.  It clamps down on the vents and holds the phone securely.  Just seems that the product could be a third of the cost if you could just buy the vent piece.
Works well & well made but too heavy with a phone  it falls off a lot maybe because of the summer heat. I also used Alien tape to help secure it but it still fell off.

Doesn't work as claimed. It is loose when I use the vent clamp, wiggles too much. The dash piece is unusable, and yes I put it on a clean flat surface. I've given it a try for a couple of weeks too. Would return but it's such a hassle. I'm sick of Amazon and barely use any services anymore. Most drivers are incompetent and lazy too. I'll probably give it away and find a better one. I DO NOT RECOMMEND.

Bought this product March 23rd of this year, needed something to keep my husband's hands on the steering wheel. It worked very well at first, great suction, good handle on the phone, great for the drives. Summer came around and because of the heat, the adhesive on the suction didn't work anymore, without it, the suction didn't seem that great either. Our stand fell from our dashboard twice and figured we couldn't keep it anymore.It did great for the time being, but figured the heat wouldn't be too bad, there's hotter places out there and California weather isn't that bad. Our parking has a roof, so I didn't think we would have to worry about the adhesive wearing off much. With all these issues, 3 stars seems appropriate, should've lasted more than 4 months I think $24 was too much for just a short time. If the weather is better where you are and doesn't get as hot as Los Angeles weather, then this may be perfect.
The sun destroyed the gummy base. It melted over time. Purchased 2021
The suction did not work so I had to put it in my cup holder which was not comfortable to use.
I live in Phoenix, AZ and the outside temperature gets as high as 117°. This is a very nice product, very durable and solid; but here in Arizona, it doesn't work. Thank you.

reviewTitle: Window mount fails in hot climates.  Leaks fluid when left in sunny area.
reviewDescription: Installed on F-150 and it fails to handle the Texas sun.  Sun has caused the suction portion to fail and the fluid in the window attachment leaks.  Do not recommend in these conditions.

Worked dash sticker worked well for maybe a month. Then it only half stuck and continued to hang lower and lower.The vent clip was okay but I didn't like that it covered the whole vent.Reached out to customer support and was notified 12hrs I'd hear something over 24hrs later and nothing.

I've had the VICSEED Universal Phone Mount for Car in my vehicle for a few months now, and it's become an integral part of my daily driving routine. I'd like to share my personal experience with this product.From the moment I installed it, I was impressed. The mount securely holds my smartphone, no matter its size or the case it's in. It's such a relief not to worry about my phone slipping or falling, even when I'm navigating rough roads.What stands out the most is the build quality. This mount feels solid and dependable. It doesn't wiggle or shake during my drives, offering a stable platform for my phone.Setting it up was surprisingly simple. The suction cup adheres firmly to my dashboard, and the adjustable arm allows me to find the perfect viewing angle. Once it's set, it stays in place, requiring minimal adjustment.The 360-degree rotation feature is a handy touch. It's effortless to switch between landscape and portrait mode, and the quick-release button makes inserting and removing my phone a breeze.In short, the VICSEED Universal Phone Mount for Car has genuinely enhanced my driving experience. It keeps my phone accessible for GPS navigation and hands-free calls while ensuring safety on the road.If you're on the hunt for a reliable car phone mount, I wholeheartedly recommend giving this one a shot. It's made a world of difference in my daily commute, and I can't imagine driving without it now.
This phone holder is great.  Holds phone snuggly and adjusts to different sizes. I used the vent attachment. Quality is very good.

Very solid mount with good adjustment capability. It holds my phone very securely and releases easily when taking the phone out. Gave it 4 stars since if there's no phone in it, its internals can rattle a bit.

reviewTitle: nice phone holder, great customer service
reviewDescription: This phone holder works pretty good. Two options, #1: suction cup for the wind shield. works well, #2: a clip for an air vent. Unlike others I have had this one has a nut on to really clamp onto the air vent grid. It works very well and the phone stays put.The phone holder has a 1/2" plastic nut to clamp the phone holder to the suction cup or the air vent holder. Watch it because  it can get lost if you don't pay attention. I didn't and lost mine. I messaged the vendor to see if I could just buy a nut. They offered to send me two no charge. They were out initially, but two weeks later they arrived. Very quick response all along. Hard to find vendors with such an excellent customer service team. I was impressed since it is so rare.

Have had mine for years, and have repurchased for my whole family. Very sturdy, and easy to use. For our vehicles allows you to put it in the perfect places, too where you can easily use GPS and it is not distracting or too far out of the eye sight. Absolutely recommend!
I like how strong the suction is.  I put it on my golf cart and it never moves.

I used this in the vent and have an iPhone 12 max pro this held up till today. Well worth the money about to get a new one. (I am hard on my car mounts) I live in the PNW I never used the suction part.
This is my favorite  as it holds larger phones good quality and can use on the dash in the window or on a vent.
Its great, it holds the phone perfectly. Also its stays steady it doesn’t move. Perfect for long road trips. The glue holds very strongly. I will say its a great satisfying purchase. I recommended.

For my car. Easy to assemble and use

The product does well to extend out, BUT the swivel in the end is limited to just about 45 degrees. That limits the versatility of the extension that I was depending on to fit in a crampy dashboard. Returned since it didn't work for me....
Removed and reinstalled numerous times to clean my windshield then one time trying to remove discovered it melted to the glass. Pain in the ass to scrape the residue off....beware!
Suction doesn't stay. Won't hold phone over bumps bc I have it in a (very thin) case, so if you have any case at all on your phone, this probably won't hold.

Suction circle ⭕️ plate is not strong adhesive i wont hold enough to place it in dashboard
This phone holder it’s very bed it’s not sticky on dashboard

reviewTitle: worked great until it ripped a hole in my dash
reviewDescription: mounting plate came lose and when removing it took part of my dash board with it. Glued it back on to cover up the hole it left. Get one that sticks to the inside of the windshield not this one.

Might return for another that will stick better to my dashboard.The vent clip is too close to the vent and makes my phone hot.

I bought this for my boyfriend and we liked it so much that I got my own. We both loved them, until they both broke in the same spot only two weeks after installing them. We unfortunately can only use the vent clip, but since they break so easily I will not be getting a new one.

I cannot get it to stick to my dash or suction! The attachment for putting it on the vent is awful! I will be driving and it falls off the vent with my phone! I have tried a million different ways and CANNOT get this thing to work! Up to you if you want to waste your money!
I like the product until I installed it. The suction grip isn't up to par. I would like a refund.

When I got this and installed it on my dashboard, I was really impressed. It held on to the dashboard for a little over six months. Then it just started falling off. I wiped down the dashboard thoroughly and tried reapplying it. It would stay on for maybe a week at a time. I finally gave up on it. I tried everything short of gluing it down. Maybe they can work on the sticky substance that is on the suction cup so it can handle they heat of summer and the cold of winter.

reviewTitle: After 4 months it feels cheap and no stable
reviewDescription: I bought this for my commute to work, I even bought a second one for mother I like it so much. Sadly, after 4-5 months of use it's not as stable as it was when it was new. The ball socket that connects the holder to the arm cannot be tightened enough to hold firm. I suspect I will have to outright replace it in another couple of months.
It didn’t last very long. I have it only a year and didn’t stick to my car dash very good.Not worth it.

reviewTitle: Lost the sticking after a while
reviewDescription: The mount was fine when it first came, but after a while the phone mount would just completely fall off to the ground while I am driving. I would try to put it back on, but it would just repeat the same motion until I just gave up and placed it away. It’s nice for a while until the suction wears off and doesn’t do it’s job anymore. I do think that this can do better, and I have hope that the one I have has been defective.

reviewTitle: High hopes for the design, but doesn't adhere
reviewDescription: I love the design of this phone holder, but in my Ford Escape, there isn't a single flat surface to be had. So I used the dashboard disk that comes with it.  Absolutely NO adhesive on that thing.  And for all the talk of how hard it would be to remove the disk, it just came off the dash in my hand.  Using the holder in an air vent in Texas isn't appealing to me. I need every air vent I have. I might have tried the windshield, but they've been tinted and the instruction booklet discouraged use with tinting. Plus that suction cup doesn't want to stick anyway.  So sad this didn't work!!!!

reviewTitle: Loved it until it broke (BUT THEN GOT REPLACED!!)
reviewDescription: EDITED: The seller reached out to replace the whole product. I already loved it and was satisfied with the design, hold strength, and angles but the back screw broke off. They were very prompt in responding and diligent in sending out the new mount. I love it! It amazing! Going to order another one for my work truck and my girlfriends car!I loved it but one day I was tightening the back screw as I was adjusting the angle and it broke so now it won’t tighten and it’s just dangles downward. I’ve tried to reach their customer support but it seems like their webpage doesn’t work and there isn’t a way for me to get ahold of Vic seed to see if they could just send me a back screw to continue using. That’s the only reason I give 2 stars :(

I followed the directions perfectly and stuck the adhesion part to my dashboard. I pressed hard for over a minute to allow it to adhere to my dashboard as per the directions. I left it there for OVER a day (over 24 hrs) and when I went to go attach the part that holds the phone and then place my phone in it, the entire mount just came undone from my car dashboard. It does not stick whatsoever. I currently use the part that attaches to the air vent, however I don't like that if I need the heat on, it blows hot air into my phone and I can't close the vent to it because the product while attached obviously hinder that action.

reviewTitle: Not big enough in depth to hold phones with pop sockets.
reviewDescription: Suction and adhesive to dash was great for only a little while since the sun’s rays beats on it through the window. Once that happened it didn’t stick anymore it fell I couldn’t reattach. The wind hands that hold the phone are too curved to hold phone with a case and any other accessories on phone(pop socket, or wristlet string. Needs to be deeper to hold and accommodate accessories. Putting phones in holder on vents can cause phones to over heat if heat is on in the car or too cold in summer when AC is on so dash is the best but wasn’t able to withstand the sun.

reviewTitle: It’s kinda alright for small phones
reviewDescription: It sticks really well onto the included 3m plate but the actual phone holder flings around when driving. After using it for a while having it fully tightened down it starts to get loose, and then you can’t tighten it anymore.(Update)Customer support read my review and sent me another phone mount, which yet again failed to hold up my phone. I had a iPhone XR, and then switched to the 12 pro max; the XR held for about a week and then started to not stay tight on the arm. I tried my new phone with the new mount they sent and it just wouldn’t stay up. The product needs to have some metal parts to it so it can handle being tightened better.

The product was easy to mount and assemble.  Problem is that the phone is not easy to see from the distance or angle.  When pulled closer, the phone charger cord hits the touch screen and changes the radio channels and functions while I am driving and then I have to fix it.  The functions are hazardous and I am afraid it will damage the car dashboard in removal.
The product was as described and easy to insta.

reviewTitle: WONDERFUL and FRIENDLY Customer Service  & Great Product!
reviewDescription: First off, let me say that I really like this phone holder.  I mounted mine on the windshield & use it every time I drive.  It is very handy and you are able to look ahead and see both your phone & the road and other cars.  It was simple to install and easy to use.  I love mine.As for the Customer Service, I was really impressed and greatly appreciative.  You see, we live in Central Texas and it is super hot this summer.  As per my picture, the 100 degree temps finally took a toll on my suction cup and I watched it melt away day by day and it finally separated and fell down.  I was so sad, but I told myself to reach out anyway and explain my situation.  So I wrote to them and told them exactly what had happened and asked them if they sold a replacement suction cup replacement.  They checked on it and approved it and sent me not only just the suction cup, but the whole end and all we have to do is replace the end piece, clean the windshield really good again and re-apply.  I am debating on waiting until this horrible heat wave is over and the cooler temps are here.Thank you Lily for all of your kind help!
I needed help with installing one of my products that I purchased from Vicseed and they’ve been nothing but helpful with their support and response to my needs
Due to the shape of my dashboard, I had trouble finding a holder that fit.  Price was right and it did fit

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS, purchased for a Honda Pilot, no place to really put it except in the radio display. It’s currently gripping vertically, it’s super strong! I will comment again once we’ve passed the Arizona summer. The vent clamp is also pretty string to place it completely out of the way.

reviewTitle: Great product, sucks in AZ heat!
reviewDescription: This mount worked great for 2 years after installation until the second Arizona summer started, then the suction cup melted. This was supposed to take the heat, but I guess not. The disc held well but the rubber grips on the phone clamp fell off, I'm assuming from the heat. But this lasted 2 years and held my note 8 with otterbox case. I ordered a second mount, I hope it does better, I would hate to have to remove that disc from my dash. I  really want to be mad, but it is hard to find products that withstand the Arizona heat. Do not guarantee your product to with stand the heat if it doesn't. This is my second melted suction cup, the first one was Mounted to the windshield, with a dash cam and it slid down the glass. I'm hoping for better. I gave a 5 star rating because I really like this mount, it suits my needs. Please don't make me sorry I  bought another one.
I use the clamp on the far left drivers side.  It’s out of the way and I still get plenty of air out of the vent.  Very versatile.  Love it!
I drive a 3/4 ton truck with hard suspension. It's NEVER dropped my phone at all.

So far, this is a really good cell phone holder the 3M. Stickplate seems to be holding very well to the suction cop. And it was very easy to install. I think this is the one that i've been looking for
My 2nd time buying this phone holder.  Fast shipping. Will recommend

I bought this product 4 years ago and it is still working just as well today as it did the day I received it. I haven’t had a single issue with it at all.  That impresses me because you don’t see quality like that from MOST things we buy now, and I felt the product deserved a shout-out!
Extremely robust, versatile and looks awesome!

Son-in-law has had this for a year and recommended it as the best. I like it because it’s very sturdy and very adjustable to go on my slanted screen dashboard. Wasn’t sure if anything would fit in that perfect spot but this did..

Amazing customer service.  I am 100% satisfied with the phone mount and would recommend. Here is a picture of it installed in my car, it works great. I drive for a living and am constantly taking the phone on the mount and back in and it continues to function without issue

This stand securely holds my telephone where I can check my location while driving while keeping my focus on the road and the traffic around me.  There are two methods to use in placing the holder, the first is a sticky method that would adhere to the dashboard, and the second is a unique device that adheres to an air conditioner vent.  The sticky platform was ruled out in my case because I have faux leather covering on the dashboard and I am fearful that the sticky substance would ruin its appearance in the long run.  The vent that I adhered to is somewhat blocked by the phone, but not so much as to cause a problem when I need the cooled air.  I am very pleased with the results and highly recommend it to anyone seeking a GPS system for driving.

I bought this for a trip & needed to use my phone for a GPS in a rental car. I was going to use the suction cup on the windshield to hold the phone. Ended up using the vent clip. Worked wonderfully. It’s not a flimsy unit.
Holds phone. Wish grip arms on sides were longer to hold bulky phone but it stays up. Good product

reviewTitle: Best Mount I have used. And I have used alot.
reviewDescription: I like this mount. I use it on my vent. If you have bigger hands you might have a slight issue adjusting this. I would adjust the prongs until it just will slip over the vent because then you will only have to make a few adjustments. (If that makes sense.)Like any other thing that has a suction cup you will need a smooth surface. (Logical would state this.) If you don't think a suction cup from the dollar store will stick to your dashboard, more then likely this won't. If you have a plastic console in the middle of the console that feels like plastic this will more then likely work. The fancy coating will not with this suction.Also. Like any other suction cup... it's thin. It will melt in the heat. Plain and simple. Especially in the summer. There really isn't a way around it.I bought three of these. One was for my boyfriend and the other my ex liked and I just gave it to him. (We are amicable.) And my bf is one of those, for some reason or the other thinks higher priced things work the best. He had like a 60 buck thing or something and it sucked. He loves this one.

I’m buying my second one of these for my vehicle. I thought about changing it up, but why? The first one lasted me over 4 1/2 years until one of the pieces that clamps on the phone failed. I’m say that’s a pretty great lifespan for $25.I love how adjustable and incredibly sturdy it is.I have a large vehicle, so it is extended more than it would be for most people. It doesn’t bounce around or loosen itself up. Great product!
I like it for my iPhone 13 Pro max
Exactly as described. Holds my Pixel 8 Pro no problem and was super easy to install.
I have an iPhone 14 Pro, with a decently bulky case (including a pop socket) and the mount works like a charm on bumpy roads and through roundabouts. Sticks really well to my slightly rounded dash.
only issue was when it was REALLY hot, the adhesive didn’t hold. Maybe switch to the vent holder in the summer. Otherwise good hold!
It works well
Well made. Easy to install car cell phone holder
Good quality, easy to use, so far it has worked well for my wife because she is on the road a lot.She is a happy wife!

reviewTitle: Wonderful product and even better customer service
reviewDescription: The holder worked great, over a year on my dashboard … (in Florida!!!) …the sticky part was loosening but their customer service was amazing and sent replacement part quickly
It's easy to use
Easy to install, works great with my wife's iPhone in her car for hands free driving.

I would like to share my experience with Vicseed. The car mount I ordered did not hold my iPhone due to the thick Otterbox case. I had to return it. Linda, from customer service, sent me an email regarding why I returned the item. I explained the problem. She wanted me to be satisfied so she sent me another car mount by Vicseed, B07R1QZ8V1, FREE of charge. She has checked with me to see if everything was satisfactory. I am impressed with their customer service department. She has been helpful and gracious. I commend Vicseed on their excellent customer service.In regard to the new car mount, I just got it so I have only tried it out for a short time. I used the vent gripper to attach the car mount. The arms of the mount open wide enough for my phone to fit in, but the arms are not long enough to fully go around the front of the case, however there is rubbery material on the mount's arms that help to grip the phone. So far it has worked. I don't know how it will hold up over the long run or over bumpy roads. Time will tell.  I would definitely recommend ordering from Vicseed given the priority they give to go over and beyond trying to meet their customers' needs.
Buy it!
We have two, one for each car. Mounts easily to the air vents in both cars. We have Pixel 7 phones and when mounted they are easy to see and read. Highly recommend!
I had a terrible car crash and this thing was still holding pretty steady with no scratches, definitely worth the money! 🫶

reviewTitle: Sticks well and holds phone securely
reviewDescription: I bought this but expected the suction cup to come loose from my dashboard in the car quite easily and was expecting that I'd have to enhance the suction cup's sticking ability with velcro or alien tape. But to my very pleasant surprise, the suction cup has stuck firmly to my dashboard and without using the 3M adhesive! It has not lost it's grip on my dashboard even through summer's heat!The holder holds my phone securely as well!In addition, it's easy to use and adjust. And the holder doesn't bounce when I hit bumps or potholes.I did get this in the summer so I don't know if the suction cup will have problems during winter's cold, but so far it has held quite well. And my dash is textured, too. On a truly flat and smooth surface this should stick even better!Great product, wish I'd gotten it sooner!
I like how adjustable it is. Also it holds the phone firmly in place. I like the release button.Very good suction cup. It’s on my windshield and holds very well. Very pleased with the quality

Bought several other types, all failed due to the steep curvature of modern windshield. This one has an extension, see photo, that did the trick in allowing me to take pictures plus to provide google map.

Vicseed makes well designed and constructed products.  Excellent customer servicer.  I needed a new suction cup for the Universal Car Holder and Customer Service responded quickly advising me the arranged to send me the replacement part for no additional cost right of way.  Very satisfied.
Outstanding product Held my radio and allowed me to push button without knocking it loose.
After two years of regular use this product is still working and is easy to use.

reviewTitle: VICSEED Universal Phone Mount for Car
reviewDescription: I used the air vent portion of the mounting system in my Hyundai Santa Fe.  It provides the most secure attachment of any vent attached phone holder I have ever used.  I've tried a number of differed vent phone holders and they always fall off the vent with my phone attached over a short period of time.  They all lacked the variable grip adjustment that the VICSEED has.  The adjustable ball mount allows you to easily set the angle of the phone and lock it in.  It stays in the position you set and doesn't drop or change the angle over time, as so many other products that I've bought.It is the Best phone vent support that I have ever used.  I've not used the dash mount portion of the phone holder yet, but if it is made as well as the vent clip, I expect it to be a good product too.

Full disclosure, I usually do not leave reviews, unless it is a junk item, but I am truly amazed with this thing!I have not used a mount before this one, so I do not have anything to compare this product to; but this is amazing.I have two separate jobs, one requiring me to drive to certain destinations using a company vehicle, the other doing the same in my own vehicle - the fact that I can easily use this mount in both vehicles by only unscrewing the phone cradle is great! One vehicle utilizes the extended bracket with the suction cup, and the other uses the vent clamp. The extended bracket is adjustable both in height and length, and very sturdy - I cant even begin to explain how many REALLY bumpy roads i have flown down, and the extended arm still stays in place!The phone cradle is awesome too! It has a quick release button on the side, so I can remove my phone in a moments notice and the spring clamp (holding my phone in cradle) is strong enough to prevent wiggle. The cradle also has an adjustable height bracket that allows me to position the phone exactly where I need the phone to perform fingerprint unlock. You can also position the cradle at any angle - you can have it titled up wards, for easy one hand use, landscape, to view media better, or even upside down.Great product, i would recommend this to any of my friends!

reviewTitle: Works for a Pixel 3a XL with a Spigen Tough Armor case
reviewDescription: Bought this Vicseed Easy Clip Car Mount for a Pixel 3a XL phone in a Spigen Tough Armour case and for a dash mount installation on the small shelf on the dash of a 2003 Toyota Camry.  The size of the mounting disk and the angle of the hinge of the mount took up more space than a previous installation of a smaller unit.  I emailed Vicseed on a weekend with a question about installation (of note, I had not yet found the installation guide, which was under a flap at the bottom of the box).  I received a quick response from the company with a request for a photo of the dashboard, which resulted in an equally quick response with instructions to dispense with the disk and use only the suction cup and a link to an instruction video.  Installation proved to be both simple and workable in the space I had available.  Phone mount seems very stable and works well.  Customer rep also mentioned that she had notified their marketing folks to ensure that the instruction manual was more prominent in the box.  Excellent customer service.5/15/2021 Update.  The suction failed about 1 1/2 months ago after well over a year of use.  I reviewed the installation instructions and viewed a Vicseed video, then re-installed the phone holder.  The suction cup failed again about 3 weeks later.  I emailed Vicseed and communicated with Alice, who I believe was the person I communicated with about my original installation.  I simply asked for suggestions as to how I could reinstall the original unit.  She said that she would send a new suction cup, but I today received an entirely new unit.  Excellent support for a very good product.

reviewTitle: Easy to set up and does exactly what I need
reviewDescription: I upgraded to a larger phone and my previous magnet mount isn't able to keep my phone upright.  Plus, I would really like to not have a metal plate in my phone case that interferes with the wireless charging.  So far, this mount is easy to use and I haven't run into any issues.Soft padding on contact points with a phone - I wanted to make sure my phone wasn't going to get scratched up or mess with the case.  Both the clamps on the sides and bottom are well padded as well as the middle where the phone rests.Very adjustable - Being able to move the arm up and down and rotate the clamp as needed makes it easy to adjust the viewing angle.  The only difficulty is if you need to adjust the arm left or right.  You have to undo the suction, turn the arm, and then redo the suction, but it's fairly easy.Two-part suction - This feature was one of the main selling points for this model.  You peel and stick a base that gives you a flat surface to attach the suction cup on the arm.  So far, the arm has not fallen off and seems very stable.  The true test will come this summer when the vehicle reaches over 100 degrees.

I was looking for a really good mount for my work truck. I deliver for a living and my truck isn't exactly made for comfort.  That being said....I needed something that would really stick to my windshield and not drop my phone. Got to work on Monday and opened the box. Boy was I impressed! First of all....the suction cup is heavy duty and thick as well. It already has sticky stuff on it to help it adhere. I moved it several times before I found the right spot. Keep in mind I ride with my doors open so everything is dusty. The entire mount is adjustable with screw like things to really tighten them down to lock it in place. The part that holds the phone is strong as well. And the quick release button is located in a super convenient place. I go down dirt roads and crappy driveways all day and this thing has not moved or dropped my phone at all! I feel completely confident that my phone is safe even without a case! I like it so much that I bought a second one for my car the next day! It also comes with a small mount for your vents but I only used it once....didn't care for it being on my vent.When it's all said and done...you can't go wrong with buying this... especially if you need one that's tough and want to keep your phone safe. It really is worth the money! If it wasn't I would not have bought two! Get one and you won't need another one because it comes with a year warranty on it....yup sure does! So.....click buy and thank me later lol.

I’ve bought a couple of the phone mounts for my 2 Fiat 500’s. I’ve mounted it on the dash because it’s the perfect angle and height while driving. The first one I bought has had no issues. The second one has given me some trouble staying stuck to the dash. I’m guessing because the dash has some texture to it and neither the disc or the suction cup stay stuck very long. However, the customer support (thank you Cara) has been great and are shipping me a new one. I’m hoping the new one will perform much better.
Purchased for the ability to use in a shared vehicle.  Works great to hold many different models of phone.  Solid.  Easy to adjust.

reviewTitle: To always depend on my phone holder to be dependable and efficient
reviewDescription: Iam very happy with my new phone holder.Seems to be very durable and dependable so far.I would recommend this product to everyone looking for a dependable efficient phone holder.

reviewTitle: Has a nice weight to it
reviewDescription: I'm glad I got it!There's a small push button and it automatically releases the grips on both sides and its AWESOME! Hahah

I have purchase five of these phone holders for myself and family members. One of them, we over tightened the locking nut and it broke. I contacted customer service and explained the situation. They replaced the parts with two new replacements parts. Quick shipping and no charge. I recommend this part. The oldest holder I have is 4 years old.

I did allot of research in various phone holders and decided on this brand. It arrived in a timely manner. The suction cup was not something I was thrilled about. It has gooey silicone stuff on it. I had one before that was similar and the goo eventually got weird and sticky collecting dirt. It had the same washing instructions as the suction cups on this product which it never really got clean and remained sticky in a bad way.The unit also comes with a clip that attaches to the ac vent. THAT I find practical and is how I use it. One thing I didn’t realize at first is the tightening screw needs to be used for the ball joint. This means you take it off the suction cup holder and transfer it to the ac vent holder.It works very well as a vent holder. I give it 4 stars because the company should get rid of the sticky goo stuff on the suction holder. Maybe then it would receive a 5 star review.
Holds really well, especially as compared to my last mount. I prefer this kind of design, but quality varies among brands. Have no regrets going with this one. Recommended.

I love the way it Clips your phone into the stand but I'm giving it four stars because if you live in 100 or more degree weather it won't stay sticking on and it keeps falling off so you're going to have to get some type of strong glue to put on the bottom of it to get it to stay on your dashboard, I used Krazy Glue super glue

I only gave it 4 stars because the adhesion doesn’t not stick on all car’s dashboard due to the car’s material! I had to end up sticking it to the window which I originally didn’t wanna do but I still love it and the pink! I would get it again.

I've used the vent clips because I didn't want the glue on the dashboard. It comes loose often and I have to adjust it and clamp it again. I don't know if it's the width of the vent or what .... but I still like it.
I installed it on my windshield and it was quite easy. Be sure to clean the windshield before with a bit of alcohol. It holds my phone even with the puck on the back. I am very pleased.

reviewTitle: Great windshield attachment maybe too good but very rigid
reviewDescription: It’s great almost too great. I did not notice the UV and other extras when I put it on. I only clean the window and removed the cover on the suction then I placed it on. It hasn’t fallen since. I actually tried to remove it from the windshield but I could not because of the adhesive. It worked a little too good. The only con is the neck of the holder isn’t very flexible
Great quality, stability, it hold my iPhone 13 max pro like a champ, great product for the price.
Good only for the windshield.

reviewTitle: Works, but not the way I wanted
reviewDescription: Had I known the suction wouldn't hold on my Escape dashboard or anyplace else, I would have bought a different product. As it was, I ended up using the vent "clip" and although that wasn't my intention, it does work for me. I should have sent it back and look for a model designed strictly for the vent.

I bought it because of the reviews. The product quality is good. It’s sturdy. But I had few issues so returned it:1. I stick it to the dashboard with the glue plate it comes. But I’m just one day, it came off. Now it is not sticking anymore.2. The phone release button is on the side left. Which is completely hidden when you put the phone. So it’s little bit inconvenient to get your phone off.Otherwise the quality is good. You may stick it with a dua side strong tape. But I’m not going to spend another $5 on tape.

reviewTitle: Why is the bolt on the bottom?
reviewDescription: I'm very particular that I don't have my windshield instructed. However with this product, I couldn't get the arm to go down enough because a bolt stopped it from moving farther down. Furthermore, it isn't stable if you tilt it upwards beyond a minimal distance so it performs poorly on that front as well.Worse, my dashboard mount didn't come with stickiness on the bottom so it wouldn't adhere. Very difficult to use. Customer service was kind and offered a replacement however the fundamental issue of its mechanics prevented me from taking them up on this offer and issuing a return request instead.

The suction cup is too big for my dash. The instructions say keep out of the sun so it can;t be used on the windshield. It is way too heavy to clip on to the air vents and even when I tried this I then couldn't change gear. A real disappointment and for me a waste of money.

The product doesn't work at all. I wish I could still return it because I never use it. I just completely forgot to return the item during the return policy time.My iPhone 10 kept falling from the holder, it wouldn't hold up. I just wasted my money on this product!
I’ve had $5 phone holders stay on my dash better.  This constantly falls off.  Didn’t come with alcohol pad- but I still cleaned my dash per directions.  Such a waste.
One of the ball mounting tabs broke on the 1st day of use but I was able to still use it. A second tab just broke and now I am out of my return window so its basically garbage.

This phone holder DOES NOT use suction whatsoever.  It is entirely held on with adhesive.[ suhk-shuhn ]nounthe act, process, or condition of sucking. sucking.the force that, by a pressure differential, attracts a substance or object to the region of lower pressure.the act or process of producing such a force.

reviewTitle: Did not stick to dash even after 48hrs
reviewDescription: I was disappointed with the quality of the product, the adhesion was terrible and fell off the first time it was used. Not worth the money.

reviewTitle: It is not good quality! And I doesn’t not hold my phone
reviewDescription: It is not good quality! And I doesn’t not hold my phone
Constantly popping off of the area I suction to. To the point where I cant use it in fear itll drop my phone :/
The clamp that holds it on the air vent is easy to use. Holds it securely. Very sturdy design. Holds my android phone well. Good quality product. Good value.

reviewTitle: The Best Universal Phone Holder I have purchased!!
reviewDescription: VICSEED Universal Cell Phone Holder for Car Phone Mount Car Phone Holder Dashboard Windshield Air Vent Long Arm Strong Suction Cell Phone Car Mount Fit with iPhone SE 12 Pro Galaxy S21 All Phones Over the years I have tried numerous phone car mount holders, numerous!  About 2 years ago I searched through Amazon and rolled the dice on this particular mount made by VICSEED, it was well worth the gamble.  The mount came in well packaged, and simple instructions.  This mount can be used on the dash, window, and vent.  I particularly prefer the vent mount holder with any phone mount holder I have purchased.  The major difference that I seen and noticed is the quality, it is hands down better quality than any of the phone mounts I have purchased over years.  So, satisfied that I quickly ordered another one for my other vehicle.  Attached are pictures of the VICSEED Universal Mount (first 4), compared to one of the mounts I have purchased in the past (last photo).  The VICSEED Universal Mount, securely holds my phone in place no matter if I hit a bump, or any form of driving.  The other mount, in park doesn’t stay in place, and will completely fall off the vent leaving my phone in the floor.  I personally have a large phone in which (Note 20 Ultra)  in the picture is my son’s Phone note 9 and the VICSEED holds up amazingly, it also has a quick release for when you want to release your phone.  Lastly, what I noticed is a major difference is the quality of the clamp. Great customer service….one day I accidentally broke the vent clamp, I didn’t think about contacting the company at first because it was my fault, I just ordered another one.  After receiving my new VICSEED mount (same one) I emailed VICSEED simply to see if I could purchase a new vent clip, they responded fairly quick, and shipped me a new one (no charge). Awesome product with great customer service!

reviewTitle: Easy to mount to window shield
reviewDescription: Husband uses everyday He loves being able to put his iPhone in it and use google maps!  Very easy to install I recommend it, especially for the older generation.

I bought a cell phone holder from Verizon 6 months ago. I was impressed...for a day or two. Fast forward to turning a knob to tighten the sides around the phone and this being such a pain and u could never get it quite right. It even fell out one day while I was driving which was really dangerous. The sides also had foam inserts in them to cushion your phone as it held it. They were both falling out. I actually brought the phone holder inside and was super gluing it and securing it with clamps to dry when it struck me how ridiculous the situation was and how this product was so much more trouble than it was worth.I am getting ready for a road trip and needed something to hold my phone safely so I can use it for phone calls, navigation, music (and be switching back and forth between all these functions. To be honest, for once I didn’t really read a lot about the product or look at the reviews which is wild considering the nightmare my last holder proved to be. I picked this one cuz it was an Amazon Choice and it had almost perfect stars. OMG!!! The button on the side is AMAZING! I just rest my phone on the “shelf” for the bottom and squeeze the sides together and it just stays put. NO KNOB TO TURN!!! But WAIT...it gets BETTER...to release your phone, you just push the MAGIC BUTTON!!! WHAAAT??? Who is the genius who came up with that? This seems really well made and I don’t anticipate any unusual wear and tear like I ran into with the piece of crap I had before. There is no foam in here to fall out and I am not worried in the least that my phone will slip out when I’m driving and be sliding around under my feet. I liked it so much straight out of the box that I adhered it to my dash. I have never done that before with anything and didn’t know what to expect. I don’t worry about that coming off either...it’s solid. You know how every once in a while an everyday purchase makes your life infinitely better? This was that purchase for me.

I was hesitant when I first got this phone stand because I had yet to find one that won’t break or make my phone fall during the first week. This one has met all my expectations and is really sturdy!! I love it.
This phone holder is absolutely awesome! I own two of them!  Simple and easy to use,  rugged and extremely sturdy,  these holders will make you smile.
Sticks to various surface's, no issues. Very sturdy unit.
Lindo ajustable perfecto 💯
Judy tight for truvl

I tried the VICSEED CD phone holder since I preferred not to attach my phone to one of the A/C vents or mount on the dash or windshield. The VICSEED CD mount was very sturdy and well made but I didn't like that my phone obstructed my backup camera screen on my Prius V. I was disappointed because I liked the quality of the VICSEED phone mount so I wanted to replace it with another VICSEED product. I was very pleased with this VICSEED suction cup mounted phone holder. It is actually designed for the dash or windshield mounting but my Prius has a small quarter window that I was able to mount the phone holder. It is the perfect location since it doesn't obstruct my view and I can easily view my phone when using GPS. So far, the suction cup is very strong and stable. The VICSEED products are high quality and are reasonably priced.

This unit has multiple ways to mount the phone holder. You can use the suction cup, add adhesive, or use vent mount. The dash in the 3rd Generation Silverado does not allow for any clip or spring mount and since I won't use adhesives on my vehicles, I have opted for the vent mount. However, since a suction mount is included, it is nice to know that I could try the suction option, down the road. Anyway the vent mount holds my phone tight and no slippage. I tried another brand of mount that has the stabilizing hook, but it wouldn't work with my wide, vertical louvers. Because of the column gear shift, I cannot use the right vent, so I placed it on the left, with good results. I am satisfied with my purchase and will keep this product ear marked if I ever need to buy a new one.

reviewTitle: RECOMIENDO LA COMPRA DE ESTE SOPORTE...
reviewDescription: Es el segundo que pido para otro coche que tenemos en la familia, y os puedo asegurar que es de calidad y de muy buena sujeción, pues había probado otras marcas y se soltaban por el peso del tfno o por el movimiento del coche, y con este modelo voy tranquila, ahora no solo escucho las indicaciones del GPS sino que puedo mirar por donde me lleva ya que lo tengo a la altura de mi vista.Es apto para cualquier tamaño y modelo de teléfono...LO RECOMIENDOIt is the second one that I have ordered for another car that we have in the family, and I can assure you that it is of quality and has very good support, since I had tried other brands and they came loose due to the weight of the phone or the movement of the car, and with With this model I feel calm, now I not only listen to the GPS indications but I can look where it takes me since I have it at my eye level.It is suitable for any size and model of phone...I RECOMMEND IT
Works great

All of my previous experiences with car mounts involved things falling off.  I've had various Garmins with Garmin mounts, and they always fell off (whether from the windshield or a disc).  It got to the point that I would leave my GPS plugged in constantly while using it, so that if it fell in floorboard while I was driving, I could pull it up with one hand using the power cord.  It did that a lot.  Inevitably while I was driving in very heavy, crazy traffic with an exit coming up in under a mile.  So that's what I have to compare this mount to.This mount came with a disc to put on my dashboard, but I didn't want to pry off the old Garmin disc.  I was afraid that would damage my dashboard, since the thing has been there for 12 years or so.  I considered stacking the discs, but thought I should try the new mount on the old disc first.  The mount just barely fits on my old Garmin disc.  The disc that it came with is slightly bigger.  But it did fit. Just have to be really careful to get it lined up, since the fit is so close.  And it does NOT fall off.  Honestly, I can't even pry it off.  I have to get my husband to pull it off when I want to remove it, and it takes him a minute or two to get it off.I've had this for two months now.  It's had a decent amount of city and country driving, and it's been on one roadtrip so far.  Lots of bumpy roads and such.  And it never once fell.  That's all I really wanted.  Was something to not fall.It fits my iPhone SE well.  Because of the case I have, it is difficult to insert the plug into phone in while it is in the mount, so I just plug it in before I stick it in the mount.  I like how adjustable it is.  I was able to position it to where it was comfortable for me very easily.  The air vents in my car would not take air vent clips, and those were too low for me to see easily.  This one is perfect.The one thing I can't speak to is how meltable it may be.  It spent most of the hot days at the end of summer in the garage.  Not a lot of chances for it to melt the gel.For what I wanted though, this is great.  It just barely fits on the pre-existing Garmin disc, and it doesn't fall.  It's never dropped my phone.  It was a good purchase.
Easy install and removable.  Like the rotating parts
This is the best car phone holder I’ve ever had! It keeps my phone in place, it’s easy to install, easy to use and is durable!! Highly recommend it.
Got this for my daughters car and it wad easy to install

I had an issue with my suction cup not sticking back after I had to move it. I contacted the company and the replaced the part ASAP and kept a check on if and when I received the replacement. I recommend their product for quality and service.
Good

I'm a real skeptic and typically find 100 things with something and end up disappointed. But, this phone holder is 100%! I'm very happy with it. I have one in my car and one in my Freightliner Cascadia. It's amazingly strong and sturdy and doesn't jiggle in my truck. If you're a truck driver, you'll love this. If I had to be picky, I would have made the arms a 1/4" longer. However, the arms are long enough to hold my phone with the case on. Love it!Manufacturer note: Think about incorporating 4 tiny magnets to grab and hold the phone while the user closes the arms. They need not be strong magnets - just strong enough to grab the phone and hold it flat while the user closes the arms.

reviewTitle: Does not work with all phone cases
reviewDescription: it works for my galaxy note with protective case but not for my wife's leather fold over case. The little arms that hold the phone are to short (not high enough) to grab and hold the phone and cover. If the arms were 1/4" longer (higher ) it would work great. Therefore the maker should list cases it will not work with or make it universal which mean "ALL".

reviewTitle: Seems like kind of a flimsy mounting system
reviewDescription: I hooked it to the fan levers and its seems flimsy. I haven't really gotten to use it much yet. I wanted it for travel and I haven't traveled yet. My mind may change after I do.

reviewTitle: Dash mount plate did not adhere to my textured dash surface, eliminating the dual mount option.
reviewDescription: I wanted 2 options for mounting. The flat plate didn’t adhere at all to my textured dash surface. Total loss for that option. The vent mount locks in well, but has broken a vent louvre. Not too happy with that result.

Worked great until I bought a protective hardshell for my phone.Now, the little arms that you squeeze to secure the phone, are too small to grip it properly and tightly, it keeps falling off.Something to consider if you have full hardshell case on your phone...

Didn’t last on my dash but maybe a couple of days, I guess it’s too hot in my car. Kept falling down holding my iPhone 11 medium size without case. Suction wasn’t super sticky. I make car driving videos and this last only a few drives. Oh well, I will look for a different one.

Last one lasted a couple years and melted off the winshield for some reason.This one goes on, but the part thet holds the phone seems cheap and is manual.  My last one closed on the phone automatically.Time will tell.

There were so many great reviews, so we were disappointed when ours kept falling off the windshield. Within a week it fell off more than four times. Plus, the sticky part got all full of carpet fuzz. Amazon was great about the return, though.

I was going to try to use the suction cup attachment, however for my car, the prime placement would have interfered with either sightlines or dash functions. The weight of the item closed the vent without the phone in place and attaching it to the passenger vent put the phone too far away. I suppose it would work for a different car.

reviewTitle: Doesn’t automatically grip phone you have to manually do it
reviewDescription: Lots of other products will automatically close on your phone when you place it on the stand. I did not realize this one did not come with that feature.So far this one holds my phone in place well and sticks to the dash well.

reviewTitle: The south Florida heat and humidity will cause the mount to Lose its suction ability.
reviewDescription: The south Florida heat and humidity will cause the mount to Lose its suction ability over time. Mines slide off my window shield after 4 months. Try to contact the manufacturers. But website is no longer available.
Ideally a great product, however it couldn’t stand up to the Texas heat. I appreciate that it can adjust to the size of your device and is an easy in/out to release and engage.
The clip works fine but the little adhesive circle did not work at all. I even pressed on it for a minute and didn’t put the suction on for 24hrs🤷🏽‍♀️ I really wanted to mount this to my dashboard.
Constantly came loose.
This works very well and swivels easily. However, it’s so bulky, it blocks your view.

reviewTitle: I love this mount but it doesn't stay put
reviewDescription: perfect size and ability to adjust the position. But the screw part comes loose often and I have to keep remounting it. I tightened the piece on the back and it still did the same thing.
Only problem with most of these cell phone  holders is with the fact they are just barely  deep enough to hold one with an additional outer protective casing (otter).Otherwise it works fine
Suction and adhesion both terrible.  Car out in sun for a few hours and adhesion wore off.Tried suction but slight curve to dash made it impossible. Ended up using clip mounts.  That works better.
Not what the picture showed! It works, but none the less not the same head, if you are looking for model# UV 450 26 with the led lights your better off checking on the Shark website or calling shark
This was easy to install, we used the vent clip because the suction wasn't that good but after not even 6 month, the clip just snapped one day. Now its useless.

While this is very easy to install and can be handy, it wasn’t quite as sturdy and strong as expected. Unfortunately there aren’t many flat surfaces on our dash so we had to rig it a little to make it useful.

reviewTitle: Not so great for Ford Edge after all
reviewDescription: The holder itself is great, and the vent option is decent, but this was highly recommended for a Ford Edge dash attachment, and that does not work very well.  If you want to attach it to a dash board, you need a perfectly flat surface.  The Edge is slightly curving in all possible attachment areas, so the adhesive disk does not have full contact.  For other cars, a 4 or 5 star rating might be appropriate.

reviewTitle: 2nd one to lose adhesion. Wasn’t even that warm
reviewDescription: Loved this item to start. First one stayed put for 2 yrs or so, but it finally cut free on a really hot day. Could never get it to hold, so I bought another. Cleaned the dash per instructions, located it a couple inches over so it wouldn’t be on top of the old location. With a few months, and not a hot day at all, it lost adhesion. Done with this brand.

Falls every three seconds. It’s annoying because I drive a lot for my job and need a gps but this doesn’t stick. It holds my phone between the clamps well but doesn’t hold the entire car mount at all. Waste of money…
I like the way it grips the phone. Im using my vent & I wish it had more swivel on the vent. It’s a bit stiff. But overall I like it & I would buy one has a gift if someone was getting a car

I searched and searched to find a car mount that would hold an OtterBox commuter case because they are thicker and heavier, particularly with an iPhone 11. I’ve only had this for a week but it definitely seems to clip more securely in the vent. The clip goes fairly far back and one can tighten it pretty well. I did not want to go through the hassle of getting a new phone case and the suction cup really wouldn’t work in my older car. Fingers crossedUPDATE MAY ‘22 - still holding phone fine. No flopping.

I like the design and materials used for this style phone mount, however, it’s still not made to hold onto phones with thicker cell phone protective cases. I have a recharging battery pack (almost an inch thick) built into my protective cover which makes it impossible to find the right dash cell phone holder to mount it securely. I’m still looking for the perfect holder but I do like what this holder has to offer for just a cell phone only.

reviewTitle: Don't put this in a plastic bag
reviewDescription: When I first purchased this, it was great! It mounted easily on my windshield, adjusted easily and held its position well.Then I put it on a plastic bag to take on an airplane, and when I took it out, the bag got stuck to the suction cup on the mount.I pulled off most of the plastic from the bag, but now it doesn't hold suction at all.Very disappointed. They should at least warn you to keep the original cover that the suction mount came with to use for travel. Then I would, still be able to use it.

reviewTitle: I bought 2 of these and both vent clips broke on me.
reviewDescription: The only problem is the vent clip! I bought 2 of these and both of the vent clips broke. Other than that I would of gave this a 5 star. Everything else works perfectly.

Updated review - worked fine in winter months, but since weather warmed up this won't stay hooked on dash.  Don't recommend.Old review - Works as advertised.  I have a bigger phone, not huge, but heavier with the case and this worked well.  At first I thought it may not work well, but realized you need to pull the bottom part down so all the weight is distributed.I have a pretty flat dashboard, and I would say that's important when using this item.  I haven't tried the vent function but it seems pretty simple to use.  I also like it has both options.

reviewTitle: It works great until the sun melted the adhesive pad
reviewDescription: I loved this until the 100° weather hit Kentucky then this melted into a sticky mess and the oily stuff covered my windshield im going to try and fix it with out the adhesive pad sry the pic is dark couldn't charge my phone bc of this mess

I have a 2017 Kia Sportage and I couldn't get this darn thing to stick to the dashboard.  I currently have the one where you clip it to your vents, but I am afraid of breaking my vent.  I have tried so many of these car mounts that I am just ready to put my hands up.  The quality of the product is good, it just doesn't stick.
The product did not stay stuck to my dash less than  24 hours. It didn't support my phone at all. Threw the product in the trash.?
I bought this to use for Apple Maps. When I received it I wasn’t impressed. Went to install it. It stuck for about 30 seconds before it fell off. Bought a vent mount that works perfect
fell off as soon as i hit a bump. it doesnt have a long range of motion. can't put it where it needs to be

reviewTitle: Release button in poor location, beyyon 3 much better but was out of stock
reviewDescription: Use with iPhone 14pro with otter box case. The release button is behind phone and not as easy to use. Beyyon 3 which I have in different vehicle works much better, unfortunately was out of stock

reviewTitle: Air Vent Clap Design Flaw: Broke or did not work!
reviewDescription: The clap that goes into the air vent broke on the first use. It had to be broken when shipped. Just purchased this phone holder like within the last few days and already got issues. I am not sure if there is a flaw in the design or what. I would definitely like a replacement. I am going to say it was just this car holder but not a representation of all. How do I receive a replacement?

reviewTitle: Ball bearing used to support phone is major design flaw
reviewDescription: Because of the design the weight of my phone points the screen down out of vision while I drive. I've tried tightening the joint in question, but since it is a ball bearing joint it's designed to be flexible and in this case floppy. I regret not trying it out in time to return. Buyer be warned.
I bought this item and followed instructions , cleaned the dash, etc and applied it to dash, waited 24 hours before using and fell right off.  Total waste of money.  threw box away so can't return.

There is no “suction power” the suction cup only works by the adhesive on cup. The adhesive doesn’t work either, my drive to work is about 45 minutes and 20 minutes in it falls off my windshield. When I come back to my car after leaving it overnight, it has fallen off as well. Do not buy this garbage. I would have returned it if I hadn’t tossed the box.

The suction cup doesn't grip on a slightly curved windshield or on a textured dash. It worked great on my vent until it slipped a little. I tried to reinstall it and one of  the gripper fins broke. Now it's in a landfill. Replaced it with the Komoi. I love it. It grips well and costs 1/3 the price. I give it 5⭐s.

reviewTitle: cannot use this if u have a popsocket
reviewDescription: This product was actually really nice! I liked how it had the extended arm on it. The suction was kinda annoying because u can't use it right away the suction haa to sit for 24 hrs before its at its best suction. Also you cannot use this phone holder if u have a popsocket on your phn so that was a deal breaker for me because I have to have my pop socket. Other then that its a nice product just not for me

After all the fantastic reviews, I bought this, and am utterly disappointed. Everything was fine until I set my phone in it, causing it to be too top heavy, pulling the adhesive up from the dash. Yes, I cleaned and dried the dashboard prior to adhering the mount. Yes I adhered it to a flat portion of the dash. Yes, I adjusted the arms. I am glad so many people have had good luck with this, but it was a waste of money for me, and a big disappointment.

I had a cheap car mount for my phone I got for like 5 dollars from Marshall’s, and figured I would upgrade and get a nicer one since I liked having it so much. Well this was a waste of money. Followed all the directions and the 3m didn’t stick AT ALL, and thought maybe it would work with just the suction.. about 5 minutes down the road and it came flying off. Totally unsafe and a WASTE of money. Go get yourself one from Marshall’s and don’t waste your time. Will be returning.

reviewTitle: Loses all ability to stick within a month
reviewDescription: At the bottom of the suction cup they add adhesive. Seemed like a good idea when I first got it but now I can't even get it to stick for more then 15 seconds. This product is a waste of $$ I now use my cupholder to hold my phone over this because my cupholder is more reliable.

the moment ipulled it out of the box the 'locks' didn't work, but that wasn't important because they mostly stayed in place anyways. the major disappointment of this is the adhesion- or the lack of it. the gelpad on the bottom doesn't stick to my dashboard at all. I tried so many different tricks to get it on (including the lighter trick) and it just keeps falling off. absolutely no suction power, no adhesion, not worth your money
I attempted to mount the product to my dashboard and followed the instructions exactly and it would not stick to my dashboard. I spent $32.00 for it and it did not work. Do not waste your money.
Didn't stay on for a week. Waste of money

reviewTitle: Once it's on your dashboard, don't ever move it or it won't stick again
reviewDescription: I had this mounted to my dashboard for several months. It was very easy to install and I had no issues with it. Then, I had to move it slightly to the right. It never stuck again.I ended up using duct tape to try and secure it, because it kept falling off the dashboard with my phone while I was driving. The adhesion of the suction cup seems to be a one-and-done type of thing, so if you purchase this item, be aware that you can't mount it more than once

DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT AFTER SEEING ALL THAT MANY REVIEWS ! I HAVE USED MANY DIFFERENT PHONE HOLDERS AND THIS IS ONE OF THE WORST PRODUCT, I THINK WALMART PHONE HOLDER IS A LOT MORE BETTER THEN THIS & ALSO LOT MORE CHEAPER..***UPDATED***THEY WENT ABOVE AND BEYOND TO RESOLVE MY ISSUE, I’M MORE THEN HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT NOW, THANK YOU VERY MUCH 😊🫶
The suction cup will not adhere to the dash of the vehicle for more that a couple of minutes.  It constantly falls off creating a potential driving hazard.

It did take a couple of mounts before I found this one. I do carry a larger phone with a pretty durable case around it and one of the issues I have had with other mounts I tried was they just couldn't hold the phone well or would detach completely from wherever I had it mounted in the car with even slight bumps in the road. I will say that the suction works best on the windshield, which is perfect for me since I like my phone mounted in the left corner of windshield behind the steering wheel. Although, it does stick pretty well to other surfaces in the vehicle.I have only had the mount itself detach once when the inside temperature of the car was well above 100 degrees on an unusually hot day. I have never had an issue since.My one issue, and this is very nuanced, is that because I have a case on my phone, when I go to plug in a USB cable and then place the phone in the mount it does not fit perfectly with the case/USB combo. This may be in large part due the fact that my phone case does have a dust protector over the USB charging port that hangs from the bottom of the case when a USB cable is plugged in. However, if they would just make a small adjustment bottom of the mount (since many decent phone cases do have charging port covers) that would accommodate phone cases with or without charging port covers, it would make for an almost perfect phone mount.

I followed the directions to a T, mounted the phone holder exactly as instructed, and within a week of mounting it, the little plate that sticks to the dashboard giving the holder a smooth, flat surface to mount onto, popped off. Very annoying. And it happened literally 3 days past the return date. DO NOT waste your money on this one.Update: while all that I said was true, I really didn’t expect that this company would reach out and offer a full refund or a replacement. The customer service is outstanding. The woman who helped me, Kyra, seemed to care that the products that her company sells are working right and she clearly cared about the customer buying their products. You can’t ask for more than that. If you don’t have a completely flat dash, this holder may not work for you, but don’t be afraid to give it a try. This company is worth supporting. I wish more people did business the way they do.

reviewTitle: Affordable, but careful eith the lock ring
reviewDescription: I've bought this product twice. The first time was for a different car. Admittedly, I didn't take the time to read the instructions carefully. I took the main unit and affixed it to the dashboard without the baseplate.  It still holds up, but now I'm worried the material may have melted into the dash. (I'll check later). Be careful not to tighten the lock ring on the back too much or it will crack and lose the ability to hold position. If you email the company for a replacement, have your order number ready.

reviewTitle: Edited: Broke at 6 months. 2nd review after support.
reviewDescription: I like the system and it held my phone very good but the screw knob to tighten the swivel cracked because they use plastic.Edited on 12-10-2010So I reached out to the company and shared my issues with them. They immediately sent out the parts to make the repair. I followed up with another email stating that I had another issue with the suction cup, once again they immediately sent out parts to repair. First problem was a broken knob. This issue can be from the user over tightening the knob. The second issue was the suction cup. It had NO problems sticking to my window for a full 6 months, the issue was removing it!  It was so strong I had to use 2 hands to pry it off. To be honest, my truck is in the sun a lot and I have never removed the product from my windshield. What seems to have happened was that months of Texas heat possibly made the rubber break down a little and made it stick even more. There is NO damage to window and the product as it sits with the new suction cups still works, just very sticky.This is a robust product that I have put through some rough conditions. So I give the product 4 stars but the support and response a big 5 stars.

reviewTitle: It holds well and works on dashboard and window.
reviewDescription: It holds well and works on dashboard and window. On the windshield I had a little trouble with it but overall worked well. On the top of my smooth dashbaord it worked well. We just finished a 2,000 mile round trip with it attached to the dash. I've also used the vent clip to mount it in my truck around town and have not had problems. The adjustable arm works fine if you tighten it fully. It's worth the purchase price to me and nice to have dual mounting options.
Usually I stick it on the windshield. But I was in a hurry one evening and used the attachment for the vents. Works great so I’m going to leave it

Nov. 4, 2020Sadly I was disappointed to see that it keeps falling off due to the suction not being strong enough it comes with a pad and the pads its self is stronger than the suction of the mount itself. the arms that holds the phone is fine it works good but the fact that the suction on the arm does not work at all, makes the purchase worthless I was certain that it was going to work but to my disappointment and my own experience with it, it continues to fall and never be able to hold its own regardless how hard I press on the suction to the pad or the surface alone as well as having it suction to either the pad or the surfaceMay 14, 2024As time passed witha few fall offs I forcefully kept attempting to strengthen the grip. Eventually kind of worked, but would often fall. The heat from the sun beaming on the mount eventually melted the cup making it harder to fall becoming a plus, but if not positioned to your liking mite need to replace the whole thing. I might have disliked the product but as the circumstances worked out in my favor it served it's purpose; used it on the plate it came with. Switched mount for magnetic one. (Review popped up figured do a double take) I greatly appreciate the product but still can't give a 5 due to it not stay standing from the weight unless it melted.

reviewTitle: A cross country truck drivers experiance.
reviewDescription: I am an over the truck driver. I've had this product since january and have put it through 24,000 Miles of use... that's about 2 years worth of Miles for an ordinary car driver. To my surprise, this product has never lost suction or fallen off the dash. My phone is a Samsung s5 active, plus I have a case on it.. and it holds my phone adequately, although more depth in the holder itself would have been nice.As for the side support arms, they simply ratchet click in place to hold the phone.. and has a quick release button for removing the phone. The bottom support arm slides in and out as desired.If I had to complain about anything it would be the suction cup. The suction cup uses an adhesive film in order to assist the suction cup with sticking and staying on a surface. The problem with this design though is that every time you remove the holder from the car, a little bit of the adhesive film wears off. Eventually if the holder is removed too many times the adhesive film will become useless. For that reason, it's best to pick the vehicle and spot that is desired and leave it.. don't move the holder to a different spot unless nessesary.Other than the adhesive film issue.. I think this is a great holder.update: 10/2/2022I finally retired this holder last week.. only because I got a new phone and wanted to have wireless charging not because this one broke.. I would still be using this one if it weren't for the lack of wireless charging.

I really liked this product.  Unfortunately, after 2 years, I guess it was not able to withstand the heat in Florida that it took a toll on the adhesion/suction as it slowly detached itself from the dashboard.  Now, I'm wondering if they sell a replacement for the suction cup.

After checking the reviews, I decided to ONLY use the vent mount. I feared that a window/dash mount would be difficult to remove, leave nasty residue if removed, and/or would not be secure. The vent mount was a little tricky to get on and tighten. However, once I got it on it was very secure and did everything I wanted the mount to do. While it sits in front of the vent, it does not significantly block air from the vent.
Great product.  Easy transaction.

Not sure how else to title review. I use this on the ac vent,  and it clamps on it very nicely. Held up to my 1st use going to Connecticut,  driving through New York city potholes. Held my phone firmly,  and DIDN'T bust up my ac vent. I will probably get another for my other vehicle.
Works great

This is the first phone holder I had had with 2 options- one for vent holder or two for window holder.  I choose the vent holder since it was quick and easy.  This is the first phone holder I have ever had that actually works and holds my phone nice and steady and does NOT come loose!!  My son uses the window holder and is also very happy with  its sturdiness.  I would highly recommend this product.
Great quality and works well with 3 options.
This is a great product.  Went through many of these until I found this one.  No problems works fantastic

This phone mount is definitely 5 stars. I didn’t use the adhesion on the windshield or the dashboard since I tried my luck with the vent mount. I was shocked at just how great it stayed on no matter the bumps and missed pot holes. And I absolutely hate vent phone mounts but it legit does not budge. It has a ball swivel similar to the one on a rearview mirror, which allows me to set my phone at the perfect angle when I’m driving. So I can face it up, down, left, or right. It also adjusts for any size phone expanding from both sides and the bottom, which leaves an open space so I can charge my phone while using the GPS. Stability 10/10; Performance 10/10; and overall quality would be 10/10.
